title: Grateful Dead Live at Oakland Auditorium Arena on 1980-12-26
source: Matrix 3 Source Mix - SBD1 (shn id 17279) MSR>C>DAT>WAV>SHN w/ Aud Patch - NAK 700's FOB>MAC>C>DAT>WAV>SHN. C>SHN Conversion by Cousinit  + SBD2 Mono from Video soundtrack used to patch Sbd 1 + AUD1 (shn id 89260) Recording by Joani Walker: Nakamichi 300/CP1 -> Cassette Master (Sony D5M/Maxell UDXL-II90) Transfer Info: Cassette Master (Nakamichi DR-1) -> Sound Devices 744T (24bit/96k) -> Samplitude Professional v10.0.1 -> FLAC/16 All Transfers and Mastering By Charlie Miller - matrix mixing by Kevin Tobin
